text: I’m getting a really not obvious error in a custom module today
Well, with all that information we can _definitely_ help :wink:
<https://spin.d.pr/J7NlIH+> lol
:eyes:
can't save update modules
getting: Error:internal error
<@U2PDTMH53> uploaded a file: <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/files/U2PDTMH53/FBW4MV50V/screen_shot_2018-07-24_at_15.14.53.jpg|Screen Shot 2018-07-24 at 15.14.53.jpg>
good to know I’m not the ony one going insane
only on cutom modules ... js for example work ok
If it isn’t fixed in 10 minutes do we get to go home?

I realize I’m the idiot here, and that this isn’t the intended behavior but - I tend to drag items from the finder into my drag n drop templates every now and again, would be wonderful if that actually worked
lol
Actually I added this functionality a while back. Might have just broken somewhere down the line.
ahh, yea I thought it previously worked but then thought maybe it was just in my head

would love it if it were fixed :slightly_smiling_face: it’s a good idea.

kinda one of those “customers are always right even when they’re wrong” because lol that’s not the point of the finder
Looks like it works with modules but not global groups :thinking_face: Could have sworn it works with both. Won’t work with template partials yet though.
Either way looking into it

Ahhhh good observation.

template partials? you mean like drag n drop into a coded template and get a partial?
that’s an interesting idea
actually that’s a really badass idea
Thinking global groups. Template partials were also on the pipeline at some point.
keyboard shortcut for hubl reference would be neato - also if it auto focused the search field too
and change the link to the documentation to the thing you are checking  or searching (I though to add as functionality of the extension but sounds like something internally)

If you use the sidebar "Search assets" and you click on a folder search result item it doesn't take you to the folder. It just takes you back to the list of all assets and highlights the folder. You have to scroll until you can find the highlighted one.
